confession.translation[0].definitions[0]: a statement that you have done something wrong, illegal, or embarrassing, especially a formal statement
Sanchez’s confession was read out to the court.
At 3 a.m. Higgins broke down and made a full confession.
I have a confession – I like Britney Spears’ music.
confession.translation[0].definitions[1]: when you tell a priest or God about the bad things that you have done
confession.translation[0].definitions[2]: a statement of what your religious beliefs are
confession.translation[0].note_box[0].se: The police interviewed him for five hours before he finally made a confession.
Threats must not be used in order to obtain confessions.
Torture was sometimes used to extract confessions.
